GenseiDescOlimar.KUMACHAPPY:

GenseiDescOlimar.QUEEN:
[UE:Meta key="a911eda6917840e6a2546348c6bf68e7" Scale="1"/][UE:Ruby rt="ほんらい" cl="2"/]本来イヌムシ[UE:Ruby rt="か" cl="1"/]科の[UE:Ruby rt="せいぶつ" cl="2"/]生物は アリやハチのような

GenseiDescOlimar.ICEMAR:

GenseiDescOlimar.HANACHIRASHI:

GenseiDescOlimar.FUTAKUCHIADULT:
